description: This sweet and sour preserve is a breakfast topping with a difference.
name: Rhubarb Jam Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the lemon under a hot tap to remove the wax. Wash your storage jar under very hot water to sterilise.
Place all your ingredients into a bowl and leave in the fridge for 2 hours.
Remove from the fridge and empty contents into a saucepan and boil for 10 minutes while stirring.
Bring the heat down to low and allow the contents to simmer for a further 10 minutes stirring occasionally. Remove from the heat and pick out the 4 quarters of lemon and allow to cool.
Once cooled, take a few scoops out and keep to one side and blend the rest, then re-introduce the scoops back before storing.
